string.name: name
string.value: A Third Gift for the Dragon Master
When you reach Lv. 55, #p9010010# starts talking to you...

#p9010010# congratulates you for reaching Lv. 55 and tells you that she will give you another scroll when you are ready. Just how many scrolls has #p9010010# prepared? In any case, go to town and meet #p9010010# when you reach Lv. 60.
You received a scroll from #p9010010#. She says that she will give you an even better scroll if you reach Lv. 70 by #bMay 4#k.

Wow, Evan! You're Level 55 already? You really are fast... This is all so that you can get my gifts right? Hehehe, I guess everyone needs a little motivation. When you reach Level 60, come #bfind me in town#k so that I can give you the scroll.
Hmm. Why are you acting like you weren't expecting the scroll? Now, now, I can see through that. I know exactly what you're thinking, so no need to pretend to refuse.
I'm glad you're here, Evan. Let's just cut to the chase. Here is the scroll that you so desired!

You probably expected this...but this is not the end of the scrolls! I will give you the next scroll if you can reach #bLevel 70 by May 4th#k. The next scroll will be better than the previous ones! See you next time, Evan.
Your Level is still a bit low. When you reach Level 60, you can receive a special gift that will only be given out during the event period. The event ends on May 4th, so be sure to hurry.
